roles.title: Data Protection Channel Manager

projects.name: Project 1: Team Project API Basics
projects.description: A simple team project designed to practice use of 3rd party APIs. Our team executed a project that rendered a stylized deployment of the NASA APOD API and also included a simple integration with Slack. When you check it out don't forget to scroll down!

projects.name: Exercise 6: Third Party APIs
projects.description: Individual exercise leveraging Bulma that dives deeper into 3rd party APIs (OpenWeather).

projects.name: Exercise 14: Full Stack MVC app
projects.description: An individual assignment that demonstrates the complete MVC stack leverging Node.js, Sequelize, Handlebars formatted with Bootstrap and deployed to Heroku

projects.name: Project 2: Team Project Full Stack MVC app
projects.description: Team Project exercising the complete MVC stack leverging Node.js, Sequelize, Handlebars and deployed to Heroku. The notable capability here is basic integration with email via sendgrid, and deployment to a custom domain.
